content: bring handmade charm and gorgeous texture to your kitchen with this suzette stitch crochet dish towel pattern designed to pair perfectly with my suzette stitch dishcloth this towel uses the same beautifully dense nubby texture that makes the stitch so absorbent and visually appealing this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product this pattern is easy to follow relaxing to crochet and creates a towel that s both practical and pretty ideal for drying dishes wiping counters or adding a cozy handmade touch to your home décor the pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy-to-read printable and ad-free version of the pattern 1 1 https //www stitching-together com/suzette-stitch-dish-towel/
